CHAT.comment: mom and child push car. Child lifts front wheels off table and car makes noise as it touches table again.
child puts hands over eyes and INV brings meerkat into room and child opens eyes when INV speaks.
meerkat's head hits table.
mom and child move to look through other side of cage.
degu moves to edge of cage and looks at child.
degu walks around and then stands on hind legs.
child and mom start laughing.
mom nods and laughs and child makes noises.
baby is crying in background.

muffled sounds and baby crying in the background and then the tape turns off and comes back with mom and child sitting on couch.
INV brings robodog into room and child opens her eyes.
robodog starts moving.
mom and child move to floor. Child touches dog and it moves.
child touches dog and dog moves.
child sits next to dog and pets dog.
dog looks at child while child is touching it. She screams and runs back to couch.
